questionText: Canvas book bags are banned in some places.
author: A2YKW761AK4ZGY

questionText: Some school districts are requiring school uniforms.
author: A2YKW761AK4ZGY

questionText: Police offers are often assigned to schools, some armed.
author: A1CY01G7686ORZ

questionText: Schools have had to implement measures to prevent tragedies due to violent occurrences and shootings.
author: A1CY01G7686ORZ

questionText: In some districts, police SWAT teams train at schools after hours.
author: A2YKW761AK4ZGY

questionText: School teachers and principals were trained on conducting lockdowns.
author: A22VACRM9GC73M

questionText: School systems are requiring accurate and timely reporting and tracking of threats and incidents.
author: A2IU5TX5S0FA1C

questionText: One teacher was killed in the shooting at Columbine High School.
author: A2YKW761AK4ZGY

questionText: More schools are beginning to address the root causes of anti-social and violent behavior.
author: AC5UD8N187QD6

questionText: In some districts  security staff and local police maintain blueprints of local schools.
author: A2YKW761AK4ZGY
